title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content (1) HTML text within <html> tags, (2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and (3) Text with RTF tags, the content type doesn't have any effect.
EB: The dynamic text content type should update the displayed content dynamically based on the data source.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a database field with the mentioned types of content. 2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
